sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Tutorial(props) { return (

How to Play Artifice

Teams

Demons: The goal of the demons to kill every villager. The demons win when the number of demons alive is more than or equal to the number of villagers alive.

Villagers: The goal of the villagers is to kill all of the demons. The villagers win when there are no demons alive.

Roles

Demon: At night the Demon can choose someone they want to kill. If they are not saved, they will die.

Doctor: At night the Doctor can choose someone they want to heal. The Doctor can only heal themselves once. If the person who they heal is attacked, they will not die.

); } export default Tutorial;
